meta_description: Our heritage museum houses exhibits that tell the stories, culture and history of the area of the Pacific Northwest.
hours_text:
# Chart Your Heritage Adventure

Information to help plan your visit.

[Donations Welcomed](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/donate/)

## Immerse Yourself In History

Embark on a journey through time and culture with the Columbia Pacific Heritage Museum. From hours of operation to self guided tours, we’ve included everything you need to plan a trip to our beautiful corner of the Pacific Northwest. We encourage you to explore the charm and history of Ilwaco and its neighboring treasures.

#### Hours & Admission

Wednesday – Saturday  
10 am – 4 pm

Thanks to our generous members and the Port of Ilwaco, the museum is free to all visitors.

#### Location Information

115 SE Lake Street  
Ilwaco, WA 98624

We are located one block off of US HWY 101.

## Calendar of Events

Discover upcoming adventures! Explore our event calendar for a journey into the Columbia Pacific Heritage Museum’s exciting happenings.

[View Event Calendar](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/events/)

collections_text:
# Preserving the Past, Inspiring the Future

Unearth the heritage of the Columbia Pacific Region. 

[Plan Your Visit](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/plan-your-visit/)

## Upcoming Museum Events

## Explore the Crossroads of History

Nestled where the Columbia River meets the Pacific Ocean, you’ll find the historic fishing village of Ilwaco, Washington. Here, generations of settlers have woven their stories and cultures into history like a beautiful tapestry. At the Columbia Pacific Heritage Museum, guests get a firsthand look at how this dynamic region came to be. Beginning with the Chinookan Culture and moving up through time, we invite guests to explore the past and present lifeways of our communities – from logging to fishing to tourism. Come explore the deep history of our little slice of the Pacific Northwest.

## Embark On Your Heritage Journey

[](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/plan-your-visit/)

### [Plan Your Visit](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/plan-your-visit/)

Your fun begins here! From area tour maps to our event calendar, here’s everything you need to plan your visit.

[](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/become-a-member/)

### [Become A Member](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/become-a-member/)

Personal and business memberships allow you to join a community of other Pacific Northwest historians.

[](https://columbiapacificheritagemuseum.org/donate/)
